backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining file, folder, user profile, and mission data models with health/diagnostic queries and access‑controlled user profile operations, plus storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing mission task‑toggle persistence features, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing the creation and verification of a Draft baseline synced 1:1 with Live version 114, including validation steps and change‑control rules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loading the main React script.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑control notice declaring a post‑restore freeze on frontend modifications until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app metadata, icons, and display behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, runtime caching, and network‑first fetch handling.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying that the frontend fully matches Live version 114 across authentication, UI, components, hooks, styling, and behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper handling theming, context providers, and intro-screen logic based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing error details and actions when actor initialization fails.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG target-like gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed decorative bottom line for UI styling.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening or download a file when browser pop‑ups are blocked.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog for previewing files with support for images, videos, PDFs, and Office docs plus actions like download, open, delete, and moving files.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file and link uploads, progress tracking, validation, and triggering backend upload mutations.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders UI, with optional disabled and overlay states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated modal for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders using swipe actions and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folders view allowing creation, rename, deletion, and selection of folders with swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen file viewer with navigation, touch swiping, delete, download, sharing, and move actions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a file gallery with selection, long‑press, file-type detection, and viewer or external open behavior.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with theme toggle, auth menu, and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a short animated splash screen and fades out before invoking a completion callback.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when external link opening fails, offering retry or copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button triggering Internet Identity login with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission view handling title editing, task management, autosave, and file viewing.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title input and task list editing.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions interface, with hover animation and disabled state.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list UI handling selection, creation, swipe actions, and deletion with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper layout that restricts content to a mobile-only container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for selecting a mission and moving files into it, with loading and success handling.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog allowing files to be moved into folders or returned to the main collection with async operations.
Swipeable row component that reveals edit/delete actions with gesture handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar showing aggregate upload status.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with branding graphics and login entry point.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders, including pagination and actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint that renders the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main UI page managing folder, mission, and file views with authentication and optional smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Helpers for detecting and classifying actor initialization errors and generating standardized messages.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities to open external URLs safely and download files via blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should be opened based on MIME type, including viewer, preview, or download-only modes.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes file MIME types and provides previewability checks and human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Enables optional performance timing logs using localStorage or URL flags and provides helpers to time async operations.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Provides utilities to inspect React Query cache state for missions and log mutation lifecycle details.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs a multi‑step backend smoke test covering folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and list verification.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise concurrency limiter for controlled parallel task execution.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session‑stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical file list defining all frontend files included in the Live version 114 baseline for drift detection.
project_state.json: Describes project requirements focused on immediate background persistence of mission task toggles and related state handling.
